governmentOfTelangana: Government of Telangana • Road Safety Month
togetherForSaferRoads: Together for Safer Roads. Learn, Act, and Lead by Example.
roadSafetySharedResponsibility: Road safety is a shared responsibility. Explore gamified learning, interactive simulations, and official certifications built to engage students, educators, and communities across Telangana.
roadSafetyRulesForEveryCitizen: Road Safety Rules for Every Citizen
telanganaMandatesStrictAdherence: Telangana mandates strict adherence to road safety regulations to protect every commuter. Review the essentials below and integrate them into your daily travel routine.
helmetProtocolDesc: Always wear a BIS-certified helmet while riding a two-wheeler. Secure the chin strap snugly and ensure your pillion rider does the same.
seatbeltDisciplineDesc: Fasten seatbelts in every seat. Child passengers must use age-appropriate safety seats even on short trips.
speedAwarenessDesc: Follow posted speed limits, especially in residential areas, school zones, and at zebra crossings.
pedestrianPriorityDesc: Always stop for pedestrians at zebra crossings. Avoid distractions like mobile phones while walking across roads.
diveDeeperIntoInteractiveGuides: Dive deeper into interactive guides and prevention strategies designed for students, educators, and communities.
roadSafetyComprehensiveGuides: Comprehensive guides and prevention tips for students, parents, and community members.
playLearnEarnRoadSafetyPoints: Play. Learn. Earn Road Safety Points.
earnBadgesUnlockCertificates: Earn badges, unlock certificates, and track your progress with reference IDs generated for every quiz, simulation, and training completed.
quizArenaDesc: Earn merit badges by acing the 15-question knowledge check.
simulationLabDesc: Fix violations in gamified scenarios: no helmet, triple riding, and drunk driving.
certificatesHubDesc: Generate, preview, and verify official Telangana Road Safety certificates.
roadSafetyIsSharedPromise: Road Safety is a shared promise to Telangana.
roadSafetySharedResponsibilityQuote: Road safety is a shared responsibility that requires the collective effort of every citizen. This month, we come together to raise awareness, educate our communities, and commit to making Telangana's roads safer for everyone.
honTransportBCWelfareMinister: Sri Ponnam Prabhakar Garu • Hon'ble Transport & BC Welfare Minister
joinInstitutionsAcrossTelangana: Join institutions across Telangana that are pledging, conducting workshops, and tracking impact through the official dashboard.
studentFriendlyDesc: Designed with youth-focused UI, gamified flows, and bilingual support so learning remains fun and impactful.
governmentEndorsedDesc: Official certificates, verified reference IDs, and direct access to Transport Department initiatives.
communityDrivenDesc: Institutions log events, students share pledges, and families learn together to make Telangana's roads safer.
quizDescription: Answer 15 curated questions covering helmets, speed limits, signals, and pedestrian safety. Score ≥60% to unlock the Merit certificate endorsed by the Transport Department.
keepThisReferenceIdSafe: Keep this reference ID safe. You will need it to download or verify your certificate.
congratulationsUnlockedMerit: Congratulations! You unlocked the Merit certificate.
greatEffortUnlockedParticipant: Great effort! You have unlocked the Participant certificate.
useButtonBelowToGenerate: Use the button below to generate and download your official certificate anytime using your reference ID.
certificatesDescription: Telangana Road Safety Month issues official certificates in eight categories. Each template carries the Telangana emblem, minister signature, dynamic personalisation, and a verification-ready reference ID.
tipDragSideways: Tip: drag sideways to view the full certificate table.
useReferenceIdToVerify: Use the reference ID printed on the certificate to confirm its authenticity.
browseOngoingEvents: Browse ongoing road safety events, rallies, workshops, and campaigns across all districts. Join or log your own event.
submitInstitutionActivities: Submit your institution's Road Safety Month activities, workshops, and campaigns. Every approved entry generates a reference ID to help participants earn certificates.
keyOutcomesPlaceholder: Key outcomes, number of participants, collaborations...
shareIdForCertificates: Share this ID so participants can generate or verify their certificates.
dragAndDropLearning: Drag-and-drop micro learning challenges that help you identify and correct common road safety violations. Earn completion reference IDs for every simulation you master.
referenceIdForEachSimulation: Reference ID for each simulation completion
chooseViolationScenario: Choose a violation scenario and drag the suggested solutions onto the violation to transform the scene into a safe one.
tapViolationToSwitch: Tap a violation above to switch the scenario.
honMinisterTransportBCWelfare: Hon'ble Minister for Transport & BC Welfare
certificateOrgSubtitle: Honouring outstanding leadership during Telangana Road Safety Month 2026
certificateOrgBody: In recognition of exemplary efforts in planning, conducting, and promoting impactful road safety initiatives that created lasting awareness within the community.
certificateOrgPurpose: For individuals who conducted or organised a Road Safety Month event (Principal, HOD, NGO head, etc.).
certificateParSubtitle: Acknowledging active participation in Telangana Road Safety Month 2026
certificateParBody: Awarded for enthusiastic involvement in awareness drives, workshops, and activities that championed safer roads for all citizens of Telangana.
certificateParPurpose: For citizens who participated in Road Safety Month activities or awareness programmes.
certificateQuizSubtitle: Celebrating excellence in the Telangana Road Safety Knowledge Quiz
certificateQuizBody: Presented for outstanding performance in the Road Safety Quiz, demonstrating deep understanding of traffic regulations, safe driving behaviours, and citizen responsibilities.
certificateQuizPurpose: For users scoring ≥60% in the Road Safety Quiz and demonstrating strong rule knowledge.
certificateSimSubtitle: Recognising successful completion of interactive road safety simulations
certificateSimBody: Awarded for hands-on learning and demonstration of best practices in simulated traffic scenarios, reinforcing disciplined road usage.
certificateSimPurpose: For users who successfully complete an approved road-safety simulation scenario on the site.
certificateVolSubtitle: Honouring dedicated service during Telangana Road Safety Month 2026
certificateVolBody: Presented in appreciation of voluntary contributions, community outreach, and unwavering support in spreading road safety awareness.
certificateVolPurpose: For volunteers who actively contributed to events, outreach, and awareness drives during Road Safety Month.
certificateSchSubtitle: Recognising schools that championed Road Safety Month initiatives
certificateSchBody: Awarded for organising road safety programmes, awareness sessions, and student-driven campaigns that fostered a culture of safety within the institution.
certificateSchPurpose: For schools that organised road safety awareness programmes with valid event submissions.
certificateColSubtitle: Appreciating leadership in collegiate road safety initiatives
certificateColBody: Presented to coordinators who mobilised student communities, led campaigns, and ensured the success of Road Safety Month engagements on campus.
certificateColPurpose: For faculty or student coordinators who led Road Safety Month initiatives at their college campuses.
certificateTopperSubtitle: Celebrating top performance in Telangana Road Safety Month simulations
certificateTopperBody: Awarded to top-performing individuals who excelled in interactive simulations, demonstrating exceptional mastery of safe road behaviour and disciplined decision-making.
certificateTopperPurpose: For district/state level top performers in quizzes or simulations, based on leaderboards and evaluation.
scenarioWalkingOnRoad: Walking on road instead of footpath
tapYesToConfirmHabit: Tap "Yes" to confirm each habit. Only after you respond will the reinforcement appear — helping you actively remember the point. A reference ID unlocks once you acknowledge every habit across all sections.
keepGoingCompletionId: Keep going! The completion ID appears automatically after all prompts are acknowledged.
fantasticRevisitedHabits: Fantastic! You consciously revisited every habit in this guide.
noteCompletionReferenceId: Note your completion reference ID and share it with your coordinator if asked.
safetyIsChainOfDecisions: Safety is a chain of small decisions. Confirm each prevention step with "Yes" to reveal why it matters. Finish every section to receive a reference ID acknowledging your commitment.
completeAllPromptsPrevention: Complete all prompts to unlock your prevention reference ID.
thankYouForPledging: Thank you for pledging to prevent incidents before they occur.
preventionReferenceIdCanBeShared: Your prevention reference ID can be shared with campaign coordinators or event leads.
fillDetailsToPreview: Fill in the details below to preview and download an official Telangana Road Safety Month certificate with the Telangana emblem, minister signature, and your personalised information.
shareReferenceIdWithRecipients: Share this reference ID with recipients. They can reuse it to download or verify certificates.
addSpecialMention: Add any special mention, description, or appreciation message.
yourCertificateIsReady: Your certificate is ready. Click the download button to save it as a PDF file on your device.
couldNotGeneratePdf: Could not generate the PDF. Please retry after a few seconds.
recogniseDistrictLedEvents: Recognise district-led Road Safety Month events with certificates that highlight your Regional Transport Authority (RTA) leadership alongside the Hon'ble Chief Minister and Transport Minister. Select a regional profile below to pre-fill the certificate generator.
pleaseAnswerAllQuestions: Please answer all questions before submitting.
